name: Galaxy Trucker: Extended Edition
description: Sign up to be a galaxy trucker today! An adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s award-winning board game is now on Steam. Already includes the ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES expansion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz processor single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 ghz processor dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 250 MB available space
